module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *12.0.5* Be more verbose about php-xml not being installed *12.0.4* Speed improvements. *12.0.3* Drag and drop order sorting and saving *12.0.2* Visuals *12.0.1* Initial checkin of new dashboard for FreePBX 12!
